projects.title: E-commerce Application
projects.description:
Developed a full-stack e-commerce web application using Node.js, Express, and MongoDB. Key features include: 
- User authentication with JWT 
- Role-based access control for admins and customers 
- Product CRUD operations with image upload functionality 
- Integration with Stripe API for secure payment processing 
- Responsive design with mobile-first approach 
- Deployed on Heroku with a CI/CD pipeline using GitHub Actions.

projects.title: React Native Quran App
projects.description:
Built a Quran app with React Native and Expo, featuring: 
- A floating compass for real-time Qibla direction 
- Rendering of Quranic text with tajweed using custom HTML tags 
- Location-based prayer times using the Expo Location API 
- Audio playback of Quranic verses with Expo AV 
- User-friendly interface with a dark mode option 
- Deployed on both iOS and Android platforms.

projects.title: Grammar Suggestion Tool
projects.description:
Created a React web application that suggests grammar corrections and suitable words, similar to Grammarly. The application includes: 
- Real-time grammar and spelling suggestions 
- Contextual word replacement with synonyms 
- Integration with a third-party API for grammar checking 
- Customizable text input area with rich text formatting 
- Responsive design for both desktop and mobile devices 
- Built-in dark and light mode toggling.

projects.title: Portfolio Website
projects.description:
Designed and developed a personal portfolio website to showcase web and app development projects. Key aspects include: 
- Modern and minimalistic design 
- Interactive project gallery with tabbed navigation 
- Contact form with validation and email integration 
- Blog section with Markdown support for easy content management 
- SEO optimization for better search engine visibility 
- Hosted on Vercel with automated deployments from GitHub.
